Detailed Description

Class used for reading in text files.

Class for reading in text files. Uses gz to handle compressed files.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzTextInputFile::DzTextInputFile ( const QString &  filename,
bool  isCompressed = false,
bool  stripQuotes = true 
)

Creates a new file for reading text from.

Parameters:
filename The name of the file to read.
isCompressed If true, the file will be opened with gz and uncompressed as it is read.
stripQuotes If true, then quotes will be removed as it is read

Destructor.

Member Function Documentation

bool DzTextInputFile::atEnd (  )  const
Returns:
true if the end of the file has been reached, otherwise false.
void DzTextInputFile::close (  ) 

Closes the file.

bool DzTextInputFile::getLine ( char **  tokens,
int &  nTokens 
)

Reads a line of text from the file and breaks it into a list of tokens delimited by whitespace.

Parameters:
tokens A pointer to an array of strings that will be set to the list of tokens parsed from the file line. This array should have room for 256 members.
nTokens This will be set to the actual number of tokens parsed from the line.
Returns:
true on success, otherwise false.
QString DzTextInputFile::name (  )  const
Returns:
The name of the file.
bool DzTextInputFile::open (  ) 

Opens the file for reading.

Returns:
true on success, otherwise false.
void DzTextInputFile::setShowProgress ( bool  onOff  ) 

Sets whether a progress bar will be shown while reading this file

Parameters:
onoff If true, then a progress bar will be shown
void DzTextInputFile::setStripQuotes ( bool  strip  ) 

Sets whether quotes will be stripped when this file is read

Parameters:
strip If true, quotes will be stripped
int DzTextInputFile::size (  )  const
Returns:
The size of the file.
bool DzTextInputFile::stripQuotes (  ) 
Returns:
true if quotes are stripped when reading this file
